testCase.name: Magento\SharedCatalog\Test\TestCase\ManageCategoryPermissionsTest
testCase.summary: Change customer group for tier price

variation.name: ManageCategoryPermissionsTestVariation1
variation.summary: Check that notification message is displaying on shared catalog page
variation.data: You must enable the shared catalog feature in Stores -> Configuration -> B2B Features to use the shared catalogs in the storefront. Otherwise, the categories and products you're configuring in shared catalogs will not be restricted to customers.

variation.name: ManageCategoryPermissionsTestVariation2
variation.summary: Check that system config B2B features section description and Shared Catalog Enable control comment are correct
variation.data: Enabling or disabling the features listed below affects their visibility and/or behavior in the storefront only. In Admin, they are always available for management and configuration.
Enabling the shared catalog feature enables the category permissions for all stores. Disabling the shared catalog feature does not disable custom prices (tier prices) for companies.

variation.name: ManageCategoryPermissionsTestVariation3
variation.summary: Check that category permissions are enabled after enabling Shared Catalog B2B feature
